articles.title: DPRK Takes Merciless Action to Defend MDL
articles.content:
DPRK Takes Merciless Action to Defend MDL
Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- The head of the north side delegation to the North-South General-Level Military Talks on Friday sent the following notice to the south side, clarifying the truth behind the recent armed provocation in the West Sea and the principled stand of the Korean People's Army on it in connection with the south side's sophism making profound confusion of right and wrong over the incident:
					It is the politically motivated shameless provocation to resort to a futile military adventure to preserve the illegal "northern limit line" still today when the times have changed.
					
					Warships of the navy of the south Korean forces described the exercise of the right to self-defence by a patrol boat of the north side as "an act of trespassing on the above-said line" and preempted the firing of direct sighting shots and "shots aimed at destroying it", not "warning shots" though they were well aware that the patrol boat and its crew sailed to confirm an unidentified object. This was an inexcusable deliberate and open military provocation.
					
					The rash action perpetrated by them, firing thousands of bullets and shells with several warships involved at a time was a premeditated action of the rightwing conservative forces and bellicose military group of the south side to stem the trend of the situation on the Korean Peninsula which has shown a sign of detente through the third skirmish in the West Sea.
					
					Upon the authorization, I notify the south side of the following principled stand of the KPA on the gravity of the incident:
					
					1. The south side should make an apology to the nation for orchestrating the recent incident and putting it into practice and take a proper measure to promptly punish the prime movers of the incident as maniacs of confrontation with fellow countrymen and harassers of peace.
					
					2. The south side should behave with discretion as required by the times and the desire of the nation, clearly mindful that its stand to preserve the "northern limit line" no longer works.
					
					3. Reminding again that there exists in the West Sea of Korea only the extension of the Military Demarcation Line in the waters set by the KPA side, it will take merciless military measures to defend the extension from this moment.
					
					4. The south side will be held fully accountable for having disturbed the reconciliation and unity of the nation and hamstrung the efforts to achieve peace and reunification and have to pay a dear price for them.

articles.title: Nano Silver Antimicrobial Solution Applied
articles.content:
Nano Silver Antimicrobial Solution Applied
 Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- Nano silver antimicrobial solution developed by the Biology Branch under the State Academy of Sciences has been widely used in various units. 
					 The solution is efficacious for treating urinary diseases including cystitis, various female disorders, dermatosis and cacostomia. 
					
					 It is also a good remedy for burn and trauma infection.
					
					 It can be used with other medicines and the proper cycle of use increases its pharmacological effect several times.
					
					 In recent years the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital, Pyongyang Municipal People's Hospital No. 1 and other health units are making diverse antimicrobial goods with the solution.
					
					 The nano silver antimicrobial solution has been applied to purifying water and producing foodstuffs, cosmetics and other goods as additive, profusely paying off.

articles.title: Japanese Crime of Obstructing Korean Economic Development
articles.content:
Japanese Crime of Obstructing Korean Economic Development
Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- The Japanese imperialists committed unheard-of crimes by blocking the economic development of Korea and bankrupting its national economy during their colonial rule. 
					To begin with, they promulgated the "Company Act" in December 1910 in an attempt to prevent the advance of Korean national capital into all sectors of the economy.
					
					 The act regulated that every company could be organized only under the permission of the government-general in Korea.
					
					By the act, they brought the Japanese monopolistic capital into Korea in an extensive way while blocking the investment of Korean national capital totally. 
					
					It was also regulated in the act that if Korean companies, though permitted, were recognized as ones violating the laws for their colonial rule and plunder, the Japanese imperialists could suspend the operation of companies and, furthermore, close or disorganize them. The invaders suppressed the Korean companies with their permission at random under unreasonable pretexts if those got on their nerves.
					
					Meanwhile, they encouraged the establishment of the various kinds of Japanese companies and enterprises and actively protected their illegal activities so as to squeeze highest profits in Korea.
					
					The Japanese imperialists ruined the negligible minor companies of Koreans one after another by the method of imposing high rate taxes upon them.
					
					Taxes imposed by the Japanese imperialists were scores of kinds.
					
					The suppression of the Korean national economy by the imperialists was intensified as days went by.
					
					The Japanese imperialists did not allow the Korean enterprisers to invest capital in banking, railway, machine-building industry and other major economic sectors through which they seized the national economy of Korea in their hands and controlled its operation.
					
					They were hell bent on strengthening sectors of great military and economic significance such as "special industry" for producing supplies needed for their war of aggression in reliance upon the abundant natural resources of Korea and related railway transportation.
					
					 In an attempt to start a new large-scaled war of aggression they obstructed the development of the Korean national economy in every way, clamoring about the "establishment of a system for highly developing national defense economy".
					
					 As a result the national economy of Korea failed to make normal development.
					
					 The Japanese authorities must honestly liquidate the above-said crime.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Stop Tampering with History
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Stop Tampering with History
Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries should face up to the trend of the times and the reality and stop such criminal act as tampering with history, urges Rodong Sinmun Friday in a signed article.
					It says:
					
					The Japanese militarists paint the wars of aggression started by them in the past as "ones for liberation" and for bringing "independence and prosperity" to Asian countries. They went the lengths of running the whole gamut of nonsense that the Japanese imperialists' invasion of Korea was "legal" from the viewpoint at that time and it "helped" modernize it. 
					
					Their wrong outlook and viewpoint are fully reflected in the new history textbooks.
					
					They also went the lengths of letting loose balderdash that the International Military Tribunal for the Far East was an "illegal one as it was held under the situation where Japan was under foreign occupation" and the top war criminals were, therefore, not "guilty".
					
					What merits a serious attention is that all the acts of distorting history were perpetrated in Japan with the involvement of the government or at its tacit connivance and under its patronage.
					
					Lurking behind the above-said acts is an awful wild ambition. What is happening in Japan to tamper with history at present is, in essence, aimed at extolling militarism and repeating its past crimes.
					
					The Japanese reactionaries are set to launch overseas aggression in real earnest. They are working hard to regain the right of belligerency and the right to participate in a war and go mad with war exercises while beefing up their armed forces for aggression.  Practices to distort the history serve the purpose of backing these maneuvers for aggression ideologically and morally.
					
					The Japanese reactionaries' distortion of history is as foolish an act as precipitating their self-destruction. A history can neither be written off by denial nor can it be altered because of distortion.

articles.title: All Koreans Called on to Come out for Reunification Movement
articles.content:
All Koreans Called on to Come out for Reunification Movement
Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- All Koreans who love the country and are concerned about the destiny of the nation should turn out as one in the sacred movement for national reunification under the banner of "By our nation itself" irrespective of ideology, ism, religion, political view, class and strata, be they in the north and the south and overseas.
					Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a signed article.
					
					It goes on:
					
					National reunification is a patriotic cause of all Koreans and a nationwide cause achievable only when all of them pool their efforts and unite close in their struggle.
					
					There are for the Korean nation the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, immortal great programmes for reunification which clearly indicate the way of achieving national reunification by the concerted efforts of all Koreans in the north and the south and overseas, guided by the idea of "By our nation itself".
					
					They should make the trend of reconciliation and cooperation for independent reunification, peace and prosperity sweep the whole land to ensure that the challenge of the anti-reunification forces should be met and the movement for national reunification be given further momentum by the concerted efforts of the patriotic forces.
					
					The Koreans' movement for independent reunification is mounting higher and their enthusiasm to achieve it growing stronger than ever before against the backdrop of the atmosphere of reconciliation and cooperation being created between the north and the south at present.
					
					This is evidenced by what happened in last October alone. On the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration many social organizations and people from all walks of life in south Korea turned out in the actions to implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for materializing it.
					
					Whoever with the blood and soul of the Korean nation should courageously turn out in the nationwide movement for reunification and thus make a tangible patriotic contribution to be remembered by history and posterity.

articles.title: Koreans in China Denounce U.S.-S. Korea War Exercises
articles.content:
Koreans in China Denounce U.S.-S. Korea War Exercises
 Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China in a statement on Nov. 3 denounced the U.S. and the south Korean warlike forces for staging madcap large-scale joint war exercises, inciting the atmosphere of confrontation with the DPRK. 
					 The recent joint war maneuvers were, to all intents and purposes, military provocations to the DPRK and intolerable criminal acts of quelling the desire of the 70 million fellow countrymen for independent reunification and peace and prosperity, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 All the Koreans in China vehemently denounce the said exercises as thrice-cursed criminal acts to bring horrible nuclear war disasters to the Korean nation.
					
					 The south Korean bellicose forces should clearly know that if they persist in military provocations against fellow countrymen in collusion with the U.S. quite contrary to the trend of the times, they will not escape the nation's stern punishment. 
					
					 They should immediately stop the anti-DPRK war exercises and arms buildup, clearly mindful that those who challenge the June 15 era of reunification are bound to meet only destruction.
					
					 The Koreans in China, together with all other Koreans at home and abroad, will unite close under the banner of "By our nation itself" and turn out as one in the struggle to foil the trigger-happy forces' hostile policy toward the DPRK and their reckless war maneuvers against the DPRK as they bar the north-south relations from improving and pursue confrontation with fellow countrymen and permanent national division.

articles.title: Informada a la parte Sur la posicion de principios del EPC
articles.content:
Informada a la parte Sur la posicion de principios del EPC
Pyongyang, 13 de noviembre (ATCC) -- En relacion con que la parte Sur (de Corea) circula unas sofisterias, que invierten la verdad del recien ocurrido incidente de provocacion militar en el Mar Oeste de Corea, el jefe de la delegacion de la parte Norte a las Conversaciones Militares Norte-Sur a Nivel de General envio el dia 13 a la parte Sur el siguiente aviso para esclarecer la verdad del caso y la posicion de principios del Ejercito Popular de Corea:
					Recurrir hasta ahora, pese al cambio de la epoca, a la inutil aventura militar para mantener la ilegal e ilegitima "linea de limite al Norte" resulta una descarada provocacion politica.
					
					El hecho de que describio el ejercicio del derecho a la autodefensa por parte de nuestro buque como el "cruce del limite" y abrio primero el fuego con el "disparo a punteria directa y destructivo", en lugar del otro de "alarma", a sabiendas de que eran el buque y los militares de nuestra parte movilizados en la confirmacion de un blanco indefinido, es la injustificable, premeditada y abierta provocacion militar.
					
					Esa locura, en que incurrieron varios buques incorporados simultaneamente disparando miles de balas y obuses, es un complot premeditado de las fuerzas conservadoras derechistas y los belicistas del circulo militar de la parte Sur encaminado a detener con el tercer conflicto armado en el Mar Oeste la corriente de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana inclinada al relajamiento.
					
					Bajo la autorizacion, yo notifico la siguiente posicion de principios del EPC con respecto a la gravedad del acontecimiento:
					
					Primero, la parte Sur debe pedir disculpas a la nacion por haber planificado y puesto en practica el presente incidente y tomar la debida medida de sepultar socialmente ahora mismo a sus autores principales calificandolos de maniacos de confrontacion fratricida y de perturbadores de la paz.
					
					Segundo, la parte Sur debe actuar con prudencia conforme a la demanda de la epoca y a la aspiracion nacional teniendo bien presente que no sera aceptada mas su posicion de mantener la "linea de limite al Norte".
					
					Tercero, volvemos a recordar que en el Mar Oeste de Corea existe unicamente la linea maritima de demarcacion militar fijada por nuestra parte que tomara a partir de este momento implacables medidas militares por defenderla.
					
					Cuarto, la parte Sur tendra que asumir la responsabilidad por tales acciones que quiebran la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales e impiden la paz y la reunificacion, y las pagara muy caro.

articles.title: Crimenes de Japon que impidio desarrollo economico de Corea
articles.content:
Crimenes de Japon que impidio desarrollo economico de Corea
Pyongyang, 13 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Durante su dominacion colonial a Corea, los imperialistas japones impidieron el desarrollo economico de nuestro pais y destruyeron la economia nacional.
					Ante todo, ellos obstaculizaron persistentemente el avance del capital nacional de Corea a todos los sectores de la economia y proclamo en diciembre de 1910 la "Ley  de la compania".
					
					Esto significo que la compania puede ser establecida solo bajo la permision del gobierno general de Corea.
					
					Segun esta ley, los japoneses introdujeron en gran medida su capital monopolista en Corea y bloquearon estrictamente la inversion del capital nacional de Corea.
					
					Los imperialistas japoneses reprimieron indiscriminadamente so pretexto injusto las actividades de la compania nacional de Corea que no les agrada, aunque fue permitida apenas, segun dicha ley que estipula: en caso de que se reconoce que esa contraviene a sus leyes para la dominacion y el saqueo coloniales, es posible suspender la operacion de la compania y, a la larga, ordenar el cierre y la disolucion de la empresa. 
					
					Por otra parte, fomentaron el establecimiento de las companias y empresas de distintos generos de los japoneses y ampararon activamente sus actos ilegales de modo que estas obtengan maxima ganancia en Corea.
					
					Tambien, destruyeron sin cesar hasta las empresas medianas y pequenas de coreanos que se quedaron poco debido a la represion del capital nacional valiendose del metodo de imponerles los tributos de alto porcentaje
					
					En aquel tiempo, llego a decenas el numero de especies de impuestos cobrados por los imperialistas japoneses.
					
					La represion de ellos a la economia nacional de Corea  se tornaba cada dia mas perversa.
					
					Ademas, no permitieron a los empresarios coreanos la inversion del capital al negocio bancario, el ferroviario, el de la fabricacion de maquinaria, etc., sectores principales de la economia sino subordinaron por completo al Japon la economia nacional de Corea y controlaron la administracion empresarial. 
					
					Recurrieron con frenesi al fortalecimiento de la "industria especial" para la produccion de materiales belicos necesarios al cumplimiento de la guerra agresiva apoyandose en abundantes recursos naturales de Corea y de los sectores que tienen suma importancia militar y economica, relacionados con dicha industria incluyendo el transporte de ferrocarril.
					
					Para desatar nueva guerra agresiva de gran tamano obstaculizaron activamente el desarrollo de la economia nacional de Corea hablando tanto del "establecimiento del sistema economico altamente desarrollado para la defensa nacional".
					
					Debido a eso, la economia nacional de Corea no se desarrollo normalmente.
					
					Las autoridades japonesas deben hacer sinceramente la liquidacion al respecto.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun ratifica rechazo a la tergiversacion de historia por Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun ratifica rechazo a la tergiversacion de historia por Japon
Pyongyang, 13 de noviembre (ATCC) -- En un articulo individual difundido hoy, el diario Rodong Sinmun insiste en que los reaccionarios japoneses deben ver correctamente la corriente de la epoca y la realidad y poner fin a sus maniobras criminales de tergiversar la historia, y continua:
					Los militaristas japoneses describen las guerras de agresion del pasado como las de "liberacion" y por la "independencia y prosperidad" de los paises asiaticos.
					
					De mal en peor, disparatan sin escrupulos que la agresion del imperialismo japones a Corea fue "legal" en aquel entonces y sirvio de "ayuda" a la modernizacion de Corea. 
					
					Lo mas grave del caso es que tal erroneo punto de vista y modo de pensar se reflejan integramente en los nuevos manuales de la historia.
					
					Para colmo, ellos insisten en que el juicio militar internacional del Extremo Oriente, abierto para tratar los crimenes de guerra del imperialismo japones, fue "ilegal porque tuvo lugar cuando Japon estaba ocupado" y por lo tanto, los cabecillas de los criminales de guerra "no son culpables".
					
					Todos los crimenes de tergiversacion de la historia se cometen ahora en Japon bajo la intervencion, la tolerancia tacita y el amparo del gobierno, he aqui la gravedad del caso.
					
					La tergiversacion de la historia criminal entrana la ambicion terrible de los reaccionarios japoneses de repetir los crimenes del pasado alabando el militarismo.
					
					En su intento de emprender el camino de agresion a ultramar, ellos aumentan las fuerzas armadas agresoras, recuperan los derechos a la beligerancia y a la participacion en la guerra y libran freneticamente el ejercicio de guerra. Es precisamente la tergiversacion de la historia el sosten ideo-espiritual de tales maniobras.
					
					Pero, esta estupidez les adelantara su propia destruccion.
					
					La historia no se borra ni se cambia por mucho que alguien trate de negarla.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama al movimiento pannacional por la reunificacion
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama al movimiento pannacional por la reunificacion
Pyongyang, 13 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Todos los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar, que amen la patria y se preocupen por el destino de la nacion, deberan levantarse unanimemente en el sagrado movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria bajo la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" por encima de las diferencias de sus ideas y ideales, creencias religiosas y criterios politicos, clases y capas.
					 Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este viernes y continua:
					
					 La reunificacion de la patria deviene la causa patriotica y pannacional para todos los coreanos que sera cumplida cuando estos luchen unidos firmemente aunando sus fuerzas.
					
					 Hoy dia, la nacion coreana cuenta con grandes y eternos programas de la reunificacion, o sea, las historicas Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, que iluminan claramente a toda la nacion del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar el camino para lograr la reunificacion de la patria uniendose segun el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					 Todos los coreanos deben hacer reinar en todo el pais el ambiente a favor de reconciliacion y cooperacion para la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad e impulsar dinamicamente el movimiento en cuestion frustrando el desafio de las fuerzas opositoras a la reunificacion con el poderio de la unidad de las fuerzas patrioticas.
					
					 Ahora se da el clima de reconciliacion y colaboracion entre el Norte y el Sur y esta elevado mas que nunca el afan de la nacion coreana de luchar por reunificar el pais de manera independiente.
					
					 Solo en octubre pasado, numerosas entidades sociales y habitantes de distintos sectores del Sur de Corea se han sumado a la lucha por materializar la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y su programa de ejecucion, la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, con motivo del segundo aniversario de la publicacion de la segunda.
					
					 Todos los coreanos, que tengan la sangre y el espiritu de la nacion coreana, deberan levantarse con audacia en el movimiento pannacional por la reunificacion para dejar sus huellas patrioticas dignas de ser recordadas por la historia y las futuras generaciones.
